name: Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X. 2: Open Skies Expansion Pack
name_original: Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X. 2: Open Skies Expansion Pack
description:
Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X. 2: Open Skies Expansion Pack is a simulation game developed by Ubisoft Romania. It came out on 11-02-2011. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game.
You can play Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X. 2: Open Skies Expansion Pack on PC.
